summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6634 for the improvement of The ALLEY in BLOCK 5, WALLA WALLA ADDITION, being the alley between 20th Avenue and 21st Avenue from East Jefferson Street to East James Street; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage.
